p: Separate from fire, CO 2 fertilization under climate change increases productivity and C in all pools through time. Conversely the lack of CO 2 fertilization under climate change decreases productivity C in all pools. The smooth changes in C pools and ratio of live to dead C for both no-fire scenarios indicate little change in carbon dynamics. The continuing increases in all C pools for NF-WCE and decreases for NF-NCE indicate that climate continues to influence production through the end of the 21 st c.
